snippet.title: OPUS: The Day We Found Earth - Trailer
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉 https://bit.ly/3kUycgG

The multi-award-winning adventure game from SIGONO is now available on GOG! Featuring a heartwarming story written by the team's IMGA-nominated writer. In the year 160000 of the Galactic Calendar, mankind has reached far across the stars from millennia of migration. The knowledge of Earth's existence has been lost to time and is now a distant myth. But centuries of genetic engineering are driving the gene pool towards a dead end, and only samples of our earliest DNA may save us from extinction. And so, with the fate of mankind resting on its shoulders, a lone spaceship embarks upon a journey to rediscover our origin.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
